```{r}
#Plot

# Scatterplot 8
ggplot(penguins) +
  aes(x = species,
      y = flipper_length_mm,
      fill = species,
      color = species) +
  geom_jitter(height = 0,
              width = .4) +
  geom_boxplot(color = "black",
               alpha = .5)

ggplot(PhysioThesis_CLEAN) +
  aes(x = Cndtn, y = ChThCW3)+
  geom_point()+
  geom_boxplot(
    aes(x = Cndtn, y = ChThCW3)
      )+
  theme_classic()
```
